column1: Srirampur is a census town in Purbasthali I CD Block in Kalna subdivision of Purba Bardhaman in the Indian state of West Bengal.
Srirampur is located at 23.4056°N 88.3382°E﻿ / 23.4056; 88.3382. It has an average elevation of 19 metres (62 feet).
